ðŸ“– Summary: Mopad is an anywidget that enables gamepad input within Marimo notebooks. It features automatic gamepad detection, real-time visual feedback, precise timestamp tracking, and support for any button on a Bluetooth gamepad. This allows users to create interactive data explorations, games, and other applications that benefit from real-time gamepad control.
